Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to conduct a suitable and sufficient risk assessment relating to the movement of vehicles and pedestrians around your yard areas.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to prevent access to dangerous parts of the SGRAN 125 machine, namely the robotic arm operating the plastic moulding injection line.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that a competent person has made an assessment which adequately identifies all employees who carry out work, where they are likely to be exposed to noise at or above the lower exposure level.
